individual queen identifier: date queen was pulled as callow from natal colony
start date of the nest. Day on which the queen was placed in the nestbox
date that eggs were first observed in the nest
date the queen was collected (either into a second nest or into a -80 freezer)
number of days between start date and eggDate
social treatment (whether the queen had 5 workers added to the nest - social, or not - solitary)
social history - whether the queen was previously social, previously solitary, or NA (if first nest)
number of eggs in the nest on the day of collection
number of healthy (non black) larvae in the nest on the day of collection
number of pupae in the nest on the day of collection
number of adult males in the nest on the day of collection
total number of brood (sum of eggs, larvae, pupae, males) in the nest on the day of collection
number of days the queen survived from the start date until death. Value of 60 indicates the queen survived to collection
